parameter.name: pagesize
parameter.description: Number of items should be stored in a single page

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Which page to send among many pages in the response

parameter.name: fromdate
parameter.description: Starting date in fromdate to todate window

parameter.name: todate
parameter.description: Ending date in fromdate to todate window

parameter.name: min
parameter.description: Min value in min to max window

parameter.name: max
parameter.description: Max value in min to max window

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: According to which field item list should be sorted (activity, creation, votes)
